snippet: Students at a New York State high school are helping test new technology that could someday alert football coaches that an athlete might have sustained a concussion.
lead_paragraph: Students at a New York State high school are helping test new technology that could someday alert football coaches that an athlete might have sustained a concussion.

headline.seo: Mouth Guards May Sense Possible Concussions
headline.main: Mouth Guards May Sense Possible Concussions
headline.print_headline: Mouth Guards May Sense Possible Concussions
